name: SU(2) Gauge Coupling
description: SU(2)_L gauge coupling at M_Z with 2-loop RG evolution
formula: g₂(M_Z) = √(4πα)/√(sin²θ_W) × (1 + g₂²b₀ln(μ/M_Z)/(8π²) + g₂⁴b₁ln(μ/M_Z)/(128π⁴)), b₀=-19/6, b₁=-35/6, μ=2TeV

metadata.note: Weak isospin gauge coupling with 2-loop RG evolution from 2 TeV to M_Z
